text: Megaloremmius is a monotypic genus of Malagasy huntsman spiders containing the single species, Megaloremmius leo. It was first described by Eugène Louis Simon in 1903, and is found on Madagascar. ==See also== * List of Sparassidae species ==References== Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Sparassidae Category:Spiders of Madagascar
title: Megaloremmius
